website_summaries.verdict: The Memorex Travel Speaker offers a compact, foldable design and some handy extras, but the so-so sound quality and cheap plastic construction will likely be a turnoff for some potential buyers.
pros: The Memorex Travel Speaker features a compact, folding design with an understated style
It can run off of batteries and will charge the iPod when plugged in to wall power
There's a digital clock and an auxiliary line input option
cons: The Memorex Travel Speaker has a cheap-feeling plastic body and offers thin sound with no bass
Volume adjustment is limited, and the clock doesn't have an alarm function

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little portable
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as a Christmas present for my mom a few years ago. She's not super techy but needed speakers to play her iPod shuffle when she had guests. It also travels easily. I recently purchased one for myself to use in my office/craft room and to take with me to scrapbooking crops and other events that allow me to play music for a small group. At the time I purchased it, it was on sale for $19 dollars and I could kick myself for not buying an additional one for our guest room and my office.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on vacation and also bought a male/male audio adapter because previous reviewers complained that they were not able to manipulate the volume controls satisfactorily. The adapter allows you to use the volume control on your iDevices rather than the one on the speaker. While I don't find the volume control on the speaker as horrible as some of the reviewers have said, the adapter really does improve the performance for an extra $2. Overall the speaker is light and small and puts out decent sound at a small price. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Sopko Daniel

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I owned an earlier version of this Memorex travel speaker. It was not labeled just for "iPod." It also charged my iPhone while it was inserted into the dock playing my iPod on my iPhone. I was disappointed that this device did not charge my iPhone while iPod was docked and playing. Even though the speaker in the older model was "busted" -- I assume from playing it too loudly -- I have retained it to use as a charger for my iPhone. All else is satisfactory in this newer version.
customer_reviews.author: aliehs

customer_reviews.title: Volume control not very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on-the-go and in my basement with my iPod Classic. The sound quality is not bad, not much base and the volume control is very touchy. Even using the iPod volume control with the Memorex control there isn't much control. I prefer my iHome mini speakers for these situations. I'v also used both in the car (on the passenger seat)and they were OK. For the rest of the house I like the Bose Sounddock.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers for the money! Good for older iPod connections.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker system
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great little portable speaker set for your ipod or iphone. I love that you can use batteries or the ac cord that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lind

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied but come without 3.5 mm male-to-male aux cable. I have to buy one from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, just don't touch it while it's playing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker system with decent sound quality as long as you don't touch it while it's playing! My daughter's iTouch fits fine in the dock but if you move the speaker or accidentally brush it, the darn thing stops playing and you have to start it again. Kind of annoying. I do like the fact that you can dock it with or without the cover. I also think it's a little pricey for what you get. I got it before Christmas at a much lower price. I came back to write my review and I'm shocked at how much it is now!
customer_reviews.author: Brit_Abroad

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: great little speaker for the bathroom or smaller rooms. I enjoy the smaller blue lit time when it's on. What's also convenient is that it has an aux input so I can connect my non-apple products to it.
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Oda

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: It has great sound and wonderful portability but some functions such as the clock are hard to set up and there aren't instructions on how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindjacked

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted and More!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my Travel Speaker! For what I was looking for it goes above and beyond. Plays loud enough that I can hear around the pool but not so loud that the neighbors complain! I love how it folds up and has a travel case! The clock is a nice edition as well! Only downfall that I can think of is that it doesn't work with the iPhone 4 but that is not a concern for me because I don't listen to music on mine. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M. Pressnall

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have two. Very small and portable yet durable and high sound quality. It comes in black or white.
customer_reviews.author: Niloo M Soleimani

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: this is a good item gave it 5 starts , it works well i would buy this again as needed
customer_reviews.author: David F. NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, light-weight system that has really good sound. It is great for traveling or for use at home. I am glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: lionessbap

customer_reviews.title: Portable iPod station
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit for home and traveling. So far it works great. Nice looking also. The sound from the unit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane V. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: iPod Docker Station
customer_reviews.text: Product received and works as advertised. It may not work with all iPod/iTouch if encased - station plug may not reach iPod jack. Highly recommended for value and utility.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Memorex Travel Speaker System for iPod with carrying case
customer_reviews.text: It's very light to carry and useful, everytime we go to Hotel to do Massage we use it and it provides excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: NYC K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I am a flight attendant and this is perfect for my travels. It folds up easy to place in my suitcase. The sound is impressive and charges my telephone while I sleep! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love my docket it works great for my iPhone 4 and my iPod classic. It was a great deal A+
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but was disappointed. My intention was to use it to listen to my ipod music to go to sleep. However, the volume is not calibrated correctly. Meaning, the volume is either too soft or too loud. Press for two volume lines, and it's too soft. Push the button for one more line, and it's too loud. So to avoid the hassel of returning it I just brought it into my office. Also the blue light for the clock is irritating and bright, I had to put a cloth over it. If you plan on using it outside the bedroom it may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: jb101

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Portable, or not!
customer_reviews.text: Ive had one for years and hunted these down for my 10yr old. Its easy, compact, and travels extremely well or just as awesome just sitting on ur shelf. Best bargin ever! Does NOT play the new lightening connector electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a cruise and it had lots of volume for our cabin. Great sound for the price. It comes with a durable case and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: DK Trucker

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was good for as long as it worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few hours and then failed. Sound quality was good for as long as it worked...returned it.
customer_reviews.author: darbill

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Office!
customer_reviews.text: I use the Memorex Travel speaker in my office. The great thing about it is that it is compatible with an old iPod Mini which was just laying around the house. I play it at a low volume and really enjoy the music! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barletto

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: My son is going away to college in the fall and this is the perfect little item to have a great speaker system wherever he goes. Currently, it is in use whenever he is outdoors with his friends and to have his music while showereing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharirpt

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was a christmas present and he loved it. He takes it to college and it makes everything so much easier. was shipped here on time, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Margurite Gossman

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling ipod player
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, sound quality was better then expected, charges your ipod. Was also louder then I expected it to be according to other reviewers
customer_reviews.author: Ghost654

customer_reviews.title: good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good product. quality sound, good price. i actually bought 2, one for home, one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Rkellogg

customer_reviews.title: Ipod speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got the speakers quickly and I love them and use them all the time. I bought another one to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M. Dodero

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH MY MEMOREX TRAVEL SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE I BUY ANYTHING I WILL ALWAYS CHECK WITH AMAZON FIRST.THEIR PRICES ARE RIGHT AND THE PRODUCT IS JUST AS THEY DISCRIBE IT. WE USE IT EVERY DAY AND THOROUGHLY ENJOY IT. FOR IT'S SIZE OUR MEMOREX TRAVEL SPEAKER HAS GREAT SOUND. WE PLAN ON DOING SOME TRAVELING AND IT WILL BE WITH US ALL THE WAY. COULDN'T BE MORE PLEASED. VAN
customer_reviews.author: VAN FROM WI.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to give as a gift so I have no information on its performance. I do know it arrived to me in a timely manner in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I'd have music in my hotel room when I travel. It worked out just fine. Not the greatest sound quality but far from bad. Music was clear, not distorted at all, and it got loud enough. It's easy to use, and I love the portability of it. I used it plugged in the whole time so I can't comment on the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: MillenniAKA

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable sound for a Small System
customer_reviews.text: I took this on vacation to listen to around the pool and in the room. The sound is good but the volume is low around a lot of other noise. There was little distortion even at full volume. Seems to play a little louder with an IPOD than other players. You could easily hear it set between two chairs though. The batteries last for a long time even using rechargables. I liked that a lot. It folds flat and fits in your bag easily. Good value for the price. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hentz

customer_reviews.title: Good sound...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great for the size... Louder than I thought they would be... The only gripe would be that it doesn't have an FM tuner... If not for the missing FM radio this system would be perfect...
customer_reviews.author: N M 156

customer_reviews.title: Well below expectations
customer_reviews.text: The first time we plugged this in, we noticed how "tinny" the music sounded. The device has almost no bass and sounds only slightly better than the cheapest transistor radio money can buy. After only a few hours of use, the power connector became flaky, rendering the device completely unusable. I would return it, but it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Limon

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product has fairly good sound, but is not well built. Our item was gently used and began experiencing problems about 9 months after initially using. The warranty is only 90 days, so we were out of luck. Had to throw away because it would no longer charge and the mfg wouldn't do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kopyar

product_meta.title: Memorex Mi2290 Travel Speaker System with 30-Pin iPod Connector and Carrying Case, Black
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingMEMOREX ELECTRONICS MI2290 SPKRTRAVEL SPEAKER SYST W/ ALARM Clock

AMAZON.COM


The Memorex Mi2290 Compact Travel Speaker for iPod boasts two 1.5-inch neodymium speakers custom engineered for full-range, defined sound, along with a backlit LCD display and clock function. A custom-fit neoprene carrying sleeve is included, so you can take it with you wherever you decide to go.

Compact, Thin, and Ready to Travel
Thanks to its ultra-thin design, the Mi2290 is perfect for throwing in your bag and taking with you. It can also be powered from a wall socket. Enjoy your favorite tunes on the beach, at a party, or at a picnic--wherever you go.

Backlit Clock Display
The Mi2290 features a backlit LCD display with clock function and works as an iPod alarm clock if you need one on the road.

Great Sound, Small Package
The travel speaker's two 1.5-inch neodymium speakers are engineered to deliver 4 watts of crystal-clear stereo sound from a small package, so you can enjoy high-quality music anytime, anywhere. 

Auxiliary Input
An auxiliary line-in jack is provided for connecting MP3 players, CD players, or any other audio devices that can be connected via a 3.5-mm mini jack.

Custom-Fit Carrying Sleeve
A custom-fit carrying sleeve is included for added protection while traveling.

Keep the Music Coming
The Mi2290 offers about 12 hours of playback time on four AA batteries. When you're at home you can just plug it into a wall socket.

What's in the Box
Memorex Mi2290 Speaker, universal iPod adapters, carrying sleeve, AC adapter, and user's manual.
feature_bullets: Compatibility: iPod mini; iPod nano 1G, 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G; iPod classic 4G, 5G, 5.5G, 6G; iPod touch 1G, 2G, 3G, 4G; iPhone, 3G, 3GS
Ultra-portable iPod speaker dock is powered via wall socket or four AA batteries; includes protective travel sleeve
Two 1.5-inch neodymium speakers provide 4 watts of full-range sound
Auxiliary line input for connecting non-docking iPod devices, CD players, and other MP3 players
Backlit LCD display with clock function; works as iPod alarm clock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars44 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
